best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Keep selections visible and easy to clear.
Support keyboard navigation and typeahead in long lists.
Announce changes via aria-checked and aria-selected as appropriate.
Avoid closing the menu on every selection to speed multi-pick workflows.
